mapper.select: select ComIdx,ComCateIdx,MIdx,ComToCount, ComintoDate, ComTitle,ComContent, to_char(ComRegDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(ComDelDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(ComUpDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(ComStartDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(ComEndDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from Tbl_Community
